paragraph:
The permutation of ihe elements « is a purely formal device, just as the per-
mutation of the elements 0 is. More than once the analogous, equally formal device
used by PLANCK, viz. distribution of P energy-elements over N resonators, has by
a misunderstanding been given a physical interpretation, which is absolutely in
conflict with PLanck’s radiation-formula and would lead to Wien’s radiation formula.

paradoxes.full_sentence: More than once the analogous, equally formal device used by PLANCK, viz. distribution of P energy-elements over N resonators, has by a misunderstanding been given a physical interpretation, which is absolutely in conflict with PLanck’s radiation-formula and would lead to Wien’s radiation formula.
terms_in_conflict: Physical interpretation of Planck's formal device
paradoxes.explanation: The paradox lies in the fact that a physical interpretation of Planck's formal device, which is a mathematical or theoretical construct, leads to a result (Wien’s radiation formula) that contradicts Planck’s own radiation formula. The tension arises from the conflict between the theoretical construct and its physical interpretation.

paradoxes.full_sentence: The confusion which underlies this view has been more than once pointed out *). Erysrein really considers P similar quanta, existing independently of each other.
paradoxes.explanation: The paradox lies in the conceptualization of energy. On one hand, PLancx's energy-elements are identified with Etnsret's light-qnanta, suggesting they are the same. On the other hand, Etnsret's light-qnanta are considered to exist independently of each other, which contradicts the idea of them being identical to PLancx’s energy-elements.
